verses.roman:
taṁ nirjagāra balavān
mīnaḥ so 'py aparaiḥ saha
vṛto jālena mahatā
gṛhīto matsya-jīvibhiḥ

synonyms: tam—Him; nirjagāra—swallowed; bala-vān—powerful; mīnaḥ—a fish; saḥ—he (the fish); api—and; aparaiḥ—others; saha—together with; vṛtaḥ—enveloped; jālena—with a net; mahatā—huge; gṛhītaḥ—seized; matsya-jīvibhiḥ—by fishermen (who gain their livelihood from fish).
translation: A powerful fish swallowed Pradyumna, and this fish, along with others, was caught in a huge net and seized by fishermen.
